snippet.title: Breakout (VMU minigame)
snippet.description:
This is the classic game "Breakout" on Sega's Visual Memory Units (VMUs).

The Breakout VMU game is accessed with the game "Cardcaptor Sakura: Tomoyo no Video Daisakusen".

========================

Here's a small history lesson:

VMUs are memory cards produced by Sega, and are meant to work on the Sega Dreamcast console. Not only will the VMUs save your game data, but will also unlock special minigames and bonus features for your games, depending on the game you're playing.

One example is the game D2. If you have a VMU inserted in the Dreamcast controller, the unit will display a digital compass for the game.

=========================

The game is emulated through RetroArch's "VeMUlator" core.
